verses.verse: And <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H1696>spake<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,
On the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> of the <S%H259>first<s%> <S%H2320>month<s%> shalt thou rear <S%H6965>up<s%> the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H4150>meeting<s%>.
And thou shalt <S%H7760>put<s%> <S%H8033>therein<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H5715>testimony<s%>, and thou shalt <S%H5526>screen<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> with the <S%H6532>veil<s%>.

And thou shalt <S%H935>bring<s%> in the <S%H7979>table<s%>, and set in <S%H6186>order<s%> the things that are upon <S%H6187>it<s%>; and thou shalt <S%H935>bring<s%> in the <S%H4501>candlestick<s%>, and <S%H5927>light<s%> the lamps <S%H5216>thereof<s%>.

And thou shalt <S%H5414>set<s%> the <S%H2091>golden<s%> <S%H4196>altar<s%> for <S%H7004>incense<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H5715>testimony<s%>, and <S%H7760>put<s%> the <S%H4539>screen<s%> of the <S%H6607>door<s%> to the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%>.

And thou shalt <S%H5414>set<s%> the <S%H4196>altar<s%> of <S%H5930>burnt-offering<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4908>tent<s%> of <S%H4150>meeting<s%>.
And thou shalt <S%H5414>set<s%> the <S%H3595>laver<s%> between the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H4150>meeting<s%> and the <S%H4196>altar<s%>, and shalt <S%H5414>put<s%> water <S%H4325>therein<s%>.
And thou shalt set <S%H7760>up<s%> the <S%H2691>court<s%> round <S%H5439>about<s%>, and hang <S%H5414>up<s%> the <S%H4539>screen<s%> of the <S%H8179>gate<s%> of the <S%H2691>court<s%>.

And thou shalt <S%H3947>take<s%> the <S%H4888>anointing<s%> <S%H8081>oil<s%>, and <S%H4886>anoint<s%> the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%>, and all that is <S%H6942>therein<s%>, and shalt hallow <S%H3627>it<s%>, and all the furniture <S%H6944>thereof<s%>: and it shall be holy.

And thou shalt <S%H4886>anoint<s%> the <S%H4196>altar<s%> of <S%H5930>burnt-offering<s%>, and all its <S%H3627>vessels<s%>, and <S%H6942>sanctify<s%> the <S%H4196>altar<s%>: and the <S%H4196>altar<s%> shall be <S%H6944>most<s%> <S%H6944>holy<s%>.
And thou shalt <S%H4886>anoint<s%> the <S%H3595>laver<s%> and its <S%H3653>base<s%>, and sanctify <S%H6942>it<s%>.

And thou shalt <S%H7126>bring<s%> <S%H175>Aaron<s%> and his <S%H1121>sons<s%> unto the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H4150>meeting<s%>, and shalt <S%H7364>wash<s%> them with <S%H4325>water<s%>.

And thou shalt <S%H3847>put<s%> upon <S%H175>Aaron<s%> the <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H899>garments<s%>; and thou shalt <S%H4886>anoint<s%> <S%H6942>him<s%>, and sanctify <S%H3547>him<s%>, that he may minister unto me in the priest's office.
And thou shalt <S%H7126>bring<s%> his <S%H1121>sons<s%>, and <S%H3847>put<s%> coats upon <S%H3801>them<s%>;

and thou shalt <S%H4886>anoint<s%> <S%H4886>them<s%>, as thou didst anoint their <S%H1>father<s%>, that they may minister unto me in the <S%H3547>priest<s%>'s office: and their <S%H4888>anointing<s%> shall be to them for an <S%H5769>everlasting<s%> <S%H3550>priesthood<s%> throughout their <S%H1755>generations<s%>.
Thus <S%H6213>did<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%>: according to all that <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H6213>him<s%>, so did he.

And it came to pass in the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H2320>month<s%> in the <S%H8145>second<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%>, on the <S%H259>first<s%> day of the <S%H2320>month<s%>, that the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> was reared <S%H6965>up<s%>.

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> reared <S%H6965>up<s%> the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%>, and <S%H5414>laid<s%> its <S%H134>sockets<s%>, and set <S%H7760>up<s%> the <S%H7175>boards<s%> <S%H5414>thereof<s%>, and put in the <S%H1280>bars<s%> <S%H6965>thereof<s%>, and reared up its <S%H5982>pillars<s%>.

And he spread the <S%H168>tent<s%> <S%H6566>over<s%> the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%>, and <S%H7760>put<s%> the <S%H168>covering<s%> of the <S%H4908>tent<s%> <S%H4605>above<s%> upon <S%H3068>it<s%>; as Jehovah <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%>.

And he <S%H3947>took<s%> and <S%H5414>put<s%> the <S%H5715>testimony<s%> into the <S%H727>ark<s%>, and <S%H7760>set<s%> the <S%H905>staves<s%> on the <S%H727>ark<s%>, and <S%H5414>put<s%> the <S%H3727>mercy-seat<s%> <S%H4605>above<s%> upon the <S%H727>ark<s%>:

and he <S%H935>brought<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> into the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%>, and set <S%H7760>up<s%> the <S%H6532>veil<s%> of the <S%H4539>screen<s%>, and <S%H5526>screened<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H5715>testimony<s%>; as <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%>.

And he <S%H5414>put<s%> the <S%H7979>table<s%> in the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H4150>meeting<s%>, upon the <S%H3409>side<s%> of the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> <S%H6828>northward<s%>, <S%H2351>without<s%> the <S%H6532>veil<s%>.
And he <S%H6187>set<s%> the <S%H3899>bread<s%> in <S%H6186>order<s%> upon it <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>; as <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%>.

And he <S%H7760>put<s%> the <S%H4501>candlestick<s%> in the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H4150>meeting<s%>, over <S%H5227>against<s%> the <S%H7979>table<s%>, on the <S%H3409>side<s%> of the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> <S%H5045>southward<s%>.
And he <S%H5927>lighted<s%> the <S%H5216>lamps<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>; as <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%>.
And he <S%H7760>put<s%> the <S%H2091>golden<s%> <S%H4196>altar<s%> in the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H4150>meeting<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H6532>veil<s%>:
and he <S%H6999>burnt<s%> thereon <S%H7004>incense<s%> of <S%H5561>sweet<s%> <S%H3068>spices<s%>; as Jehovah <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%>.
And he <S%H7760>put<s%> the <S%H4539>screen<s%> of the <S%H6607>door<s%> to the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%>.

And he <S%H7760>set<s%> the <S%H4196>altar<s%> of <S%H5930>burnt-offering<s%> at the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4908>tent<s%> of <S%H4150>meeting<s%>, and <S%H5927>offered<s%> upon it the <S%H5930>burnt-offering<s%> and the <S%H4503>meal-offering<s%>; as <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%>.

And he <S%H7760>set<s%> the <S%H3595>laver<s%> between the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H4150>meeting<s%> and the <S%H4196>altar<s%>, and <S%H5414>put<s%> <S%H4325>water<s%> <S%H7364>therein<s%>, wherewith to wash.
And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> and his <S%H1121>sons<s%> <S%H7364>washed<s%> their <S%H3027>hands<s%> and their feet <S%H7272>thereat<s%>;

when they <S%H935>went<s%> into the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H4150>meeting<s%>, and when they came <S%H7126>near<s%> unto the <S%H4196>altar<s%>, they <S%H7364>washed<s%>; as <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%>.

And he reared <S%H6965>up<s%> the <S%H2691>court<s%> round <S%H5439>about<s%> the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> and the <S%H4196>altar<s%>, and set <S%H5414>up<s%> the <S%H4539>screen<s%> of the <S%H8179>gate<s%> of the <S%H2691>court<s%>. So <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H3615>finished<s%> the <S%H4399>work<s%>.
Then the <S%H6051>cloud<s%> <S%H3680>covered<s%> the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H4150>meeting<s%>, and the <S%H3519>glory<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H4390>filled<s%> the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%>.

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> was not <S%H3201>able<s%> to <S%H935>enter<s%> into the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H4150>meeting<s%>, because the <S%H6051>cloud<s%> <S%H7931>abode<s%> <S%H3519>thereon<s%>, and the glory of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H4390>filled<s%> the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%>.

And when the <S%H6051>cloud<s%> was taken <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H5921>from<s%> over the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%>, the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> went <S%H5265>onward<s%>, throughout all their <S%H4550>journeys<s%>:
but if the <S%H6051>cloud<s%> was not taken <S%H5927>up<s%>, then they <S%H5265>journeyed<s%> not till the <S%H3117>day<s%> that it was taken <S%H5927>up<s%>.

For the <S%H6051>cloud<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> was upon the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> by <S%H3119>day<s%>, and there was <S%H784>fire<s%> therein by <S%H3915>night<s%>, in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of all the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, throughout all their <S%H4550>journeys<s%>.
